Articles.Content: I'm on steam, downloaded the update but still have version 0.24.2.559 none of the new features present. I have also deleted the old version and reinstalled.
Screw It, I'm going to bed.

People on Store/Steam who are saying that it is not updated, just calm down and wait a sec... it will be there shortly

I think you're missing the point. KSP *queued and UPDATED* for us on Steam. I watched it download and install. But when running the game, it's still v0.24. Something is very obviously borked.

I'm on steam, downloaded the update but still have version 0.24.2.559 none of the new features present. I have also deleted the old version and reinstalled.

This. F5'ing harder now than when on the train.
It's just as well that I'm at work. Better do my job, and just wait till I get home to see if the release is ironed out.
yep, same issue. on Mac OS deleted the game and re-installed and still .24.2

H'm. It's not showing when I log into KSP store...?!

Try using the patcher then

The store version works fine, new building, new parts, difficulty options, everything

Now if you excuse me I have to go to the bathroom because IÃ‚Â´ve been busy smashing F5 for a long time.
Download is working but slow from KSP store
"Update queued" again on Steam. Hopefully this is the right one.
Steam builds appear to be good now.
I'll report on my Steam 0.25 update experiences.
I seriously hope that don't iron it out tonight... or I'll have a spontanous cold and can't go to work tomorrow...
Linux version on steam is updated?

Same here... Here goes nothing!

2nd steam download, now v0.25.0.642

Linux version on steam is updated?

Mine hasn't yet.

EDIT: Deleted and started to download it again. This one is 200mb larger than the one a few minutes ago. I think I might be good...though this will be a long 3 minutes.
You can skip "Update Queued" by right clicking KSP, going to Manage Downloads, and clicking the download icon. Is this old news or... ?

Steam builds appear to be good now.

Confirmed! Thank you!
Steam updated KSP -again-. I can also confirm it's working this time.

*sees cargobays in the loading screen*

Haven't even loaded the game yet and I know this must be 0.25
You guys just killed my DL speed, it was cruising right along, and then it slowed quite suddenly.
I've probably got 4 or 5 different common colds at once. All caught within half an hour of each other.
Finally! Installing...
Everything working now.
Hype train had a last second derailment before arriving at it's destination
